page.title: 02WEST LEIGH INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content:
The Industrial Estate consists of many factories, large and small.More well known firms include Kenwoods who make electrical appliances;Norsk Hydro Polymers which make chemicals;Wyeths who make drugs; Data Card make credit cards and Goodmans who make speakers for stereo systems.All in all there are 17 factorys on the estate.
Wyeths have bought Goodmans' part of the estate and are moving in later in the year.Goodmans will be leaving the estate to go to a new site in Bedhampton.
